page.title: 01Rural Areas
page.content: 1. The area is, apart from two small villages,entirely rural. 2. Farming is nearly all arable (grain, potatoes, rape) but there are also a few small herds of sheep. 3. The villges are inhabited mainly by three groups of people working locally in rural industires, commuters to the nearby towns of Thirsk, Easingwold or York mainly, and persons who have either retired or have private means. 4. Almost all the property in the area is well maintained and quickly bought when for sale. There is no derelict property. 5. It is a popular area for retirement, especially in these days when so many are taking early retirement. 6. The villages have lively and energetic communities (Garden Club Y.C.A., W.I., Church, Pubs
